column1: Little Goat Diner////The reviews for Little Goat are so glowing that it perhaps is dangerously hyped. This isn't a place for someone who isn't at least a little adventurous when it comes to food. Most of their offerings are very unique twists on classic dishes - the sort of thing that makes you think "I can't tell if those two things would be good together or not") although
column3: most of the time it works out well.
